__e: He knew ten thousand times more about the world... than all the people in the world.

I don't know about you, but I think this ending is much better.
If I told her once, I told her a thousand times:
I've not told you 1,000 times, and every time I see you I have to not tell you again.
I got fucked a thousand times, and you didn't see what I saw.

You got three grand worth of killin' to do?
